about_the_game:
The standard DR auxiliary train developed and built by the Deutsche Reichsbahn (DR) between 1973 and 1979, is mainly referred to as the Einheitshilfszug (EHZ). The train is defined as a locomotive-hauled rail-bound vehicles for technical assistance in the event of operational disruptions or railroad accidents.

The train uses different vehicles such as a power generator car, a tools car and also several crew cars. All these vehicles are included in this dlc developed by 3DZUG

Features:

- Auxiliary Train Deutsche Bahn (generator car, tools car and crew car)
- Auxiliary Train Deutsche Reichsbahn (generator car, tools car and crew car)
- 4 different additional crew cars



Beschreibung:

Wann immer Not am Mann ist, springt er ein – Der Einheitshilfszug! Fahren Sie das, was ein normaler Bahnreisender kaum zu Gesicht bekommt…

Features:

Dieses Wagenset enthält insgesamt folgende Fahrzeuge:

- einen 3-teiligen Einheitshilfszug der DB AG
- einen 3-teiligen Standardhilfszug der DR
- einen Güterzugbegleitwagen der DR in Dunkelgrün
- einen Güterzugbegleitwagen der DR in Smaragdgrün
- einen Mannschaftswagen der DGT in Gelb

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

The train is set of locomotive-hauled rail vehicles for technical assistance in the event of operational disruptions or railroad accidents.
